admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
The components of the Second Port
            Project include: (A) The rehabilitation/repair of the
            provision of spare parts for: (a) A suction dredger; (b) A
            bucket dredger; (c) Pilot vessel, survey vessel, buoy
            tender, and grab dredgers for port services; and (d) Cargo
            handling equipment. (B) The purchase of: (a) New
            cargo-handling equipment to replace worn out and
            unrepairable equipment; (b) Position finding equipment and
            navigational aids; (c) Steel, mooring chains and plant,
            machinery and ancillary equipment for replacement and/or
            repair of steel pontoons, sponsons, and bridges at riverside
            berths; and (d) Workshop machinery and tools. (C) The
            provision of services for: (a) Preparation of documentation
            for dredger rehabilitation/repairs and supervision; (b)
            Training of dredger crews; and (c) Training of (i) planning
            personnel; and (ii) workshop technicians; (D) The dredging
            of the Rangoon Sea Access Channel to a depth of 15 feet
            below datum and its maintenance at that depth.
